Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: José Ángel Pimentel Márquez
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, in perfect condition, what they show is what they sell, I am totally satisfied with the purchase, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Huawei G610S Snapdragon Quad Core 1.2GHz 5 Inch IPS 960*540 with Android OS
Reviews.Author: Suhail
Reviews.Content: why did you choose this rating ? Because I think an excellent productwhat did you like or dislike ?  I like their efficiency and speed.who would you recommend this product to ? I recommend it to all those people looking for a phone with an affordable price and good features.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: ShorTee
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived way ahead of schedule and in new condition.Screen is crystal clear and I get great reception including when I use Wi-Fi or Hotspot.Only thing I'm not crazy about is the FM radio reception...it's hit and miss on clarity.

Reviews.Title: is the best
Reviews.Author: jhoan saenz
Reviews.Content: Great phone, excellent....is the best...Is more fast that ascend p6, s3 , s4 mini, z10, q10, lg optimus HD, nokia

Reviews.Title: Good Phone.
Reviews.Author: Sammy Cheng
Reviews.Content: It is good phone, but cannot work with AT&T.; I went to phone store and tried to unlock it for AT&T;, but it only work with T-Mobile. Seller (Mr. Tech) tried to help me unlock it and no luck. So I returned it.

Reviews.Title: very nice service
Reviews.Author: Paula Guerra
Reviews.Content: The seller is very kind. The service even better. Great purchase. It's price is perfect, high quality product. I just love it. BTW it came with case and screen protector

Reviews.Content: what i likethe size, user friendly ", Smart pone, easy to configure, excellent images,  like the very best. very fast on the web and very responsivehave a flash light, looks and feels  like expensive pone at half the Price.  comes with high quality protective scren filmthe  conshave no stylus

Reviews.Title: Exellent
Reviews.Author: Abir F.
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, in perfect condition, what they show is what they sell, I am totally satisfied with the purchase, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Phone Buying
Reviews.Author: Shamray Sergey
Reviews.Content: All excellent, but a lot of time at customs. Telephone satisfied. Now I try to order 10 laptops))) thank you!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, but....
Reviews.Author: Franklin Gamboa
Reviews.Content: The phone is pretty nice, but the audio of the phone is very low, you have to use a hands free to improve it a little...
